testcase.name: Verify CRM successful creation of registration page
testcase.system-out: Given i am on the hompage...................................................passed When i click on signup link.................................................passed Then i should navigate to registration page................................passed And i select edition from dropdown..........................................passed And i should enter firstname................................................passed And i should enter lastname.................................................passed And i should enter email....................................................passed And i should enter confirmemail.............................................passed And i should enter username.................................................passed And i should enter password.................................................passed And i should enter confirm password.........................................passed And i check the terms and conditions checkbox...............................passed And i click on submit button................................................passed Then i should navigate to profile details page..............................passed
